task_prefix: Air Pressure System (APS) failure prediction for Scania trucks. Dataset contains sensor data and operational parameters to predict component failures for preventive maintenance and cost reduction. Each example contains 4 features. Predict the target class.

column_descriptions.class: Binary indicator of APS component failure. Positive class indicates APS-related failure, negative indicates other component failures.
column_descriptions.aa_000 to az_xxx: Anonymized operational sensor readings and counters. Single numerical values representing various truck system measurements like pressure, temperature, mileage, and operational cycles.
column_descriptions.ba_000 to bz_xxx: Histogram features representing distributions of operational conditions. Each feature contains binned counts of specific measurements over time windows.
column_descriptions.ca_000 to cz_xxx: Additional anonymized features including derived statistics, aggregated measurements, and complex operational indicators.

class_description: Classes: 'pos' (Positive class - APS component failure detected (1,000 instances in training set, ~1.7%)), 'neg' (Negative class - Failure in components not related to APS (59,000 instances in training set, ~98.3%))
